org.corfudb.infrastructure

Class ManagementServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.infrastructure.AbstractServer
      • org.corfudb.infrastructure.ManagementServer

  • public class ManagementServer
extends AbstractServer
    Handles reconfiguration and workflow requests to the Management Server. Spawns the following services: - Management Agent. - Orchestrator.

    Created by zlokhandwala on 9/28/16.

                                      io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerContext ctx,

                                     io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                                     IServerRouter r)
        Triggers the failure handler. The msg contains the failed/defected nodes.
        Parameters:

        r - server router

      • handleHeartbeatRequest

        public void handleHeartbeatRequest(CorfuMsg msg,
                                   io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                                   IServerRouter r)
        Handles the heartbeat request. It accumulates the metrics required to build and send the response. The response comprises of the local nodeMetrics and this node's view of the cluster (NodeView).
        Parameters:
        msg - corfu message containing HEARTBEAT_REQUEST
        ctx - netty ChannelHandlerContext
        r - server router

        public void shutdown()
        Management Server shutdown: Shuts down the fault detector service.
